subject: Constructor for test case called multiple times
msgSnippet: It seems that depending on the number of unit test methods in my TestCase,  the constructor is called that many times. Is this because of the way junit
messageBody:
It seems that depending on the number of unit test methods in my
TestCase, the constructor is called that many times.

Is this because of the way junit framework is setup?

Does the framework create mutiple test case objects *under the hood*
depending on the number of testXXXXX() methods that I have and then
run the test method for each one of these objects?

I could not glean this information from the framework documentation
of junit. Only the fact that reflection is used.

any one know what is goin on?


TIA.
Korosh.
